overview: A horror movie that teaches bullies what can happen when they abuse the wrong person or do nothing to stop a bully. There is no physical violence, only a royal mind screw of the victims. Seventeen mental torchers and a brain washing chamber are deployed
tagline: A Neurotic man who was deformed and bullied in his youth captures and recruits a legion of followers while being assisted by a schizophrenic keeper. Mission; to stop bullying the hard way.
title: The Hunchback of Bel Air
